name: Operation Sky Burner
description:
At an unknown location in Colorado, the United States tested a top secret missile defense system: Operation Sky Burner. Fly through the test facility and disarm the missile. Play with a controller or keyboard!

This game was made for JamGoJam  | JamDNA 2.

Programming and graphics: ATA_Games

Music and sound design: https://the-count.itch.io/

The following assets were not made from scratch:

Eagle Screech Sound: http://soundbible.com/1844-Hawk-Screeching.html recorded by Mike Koenig, and a gamepad input script that I wrote a year ago.
